Â 1. Sharing Knowledge With this blog I aim to share my projects, which are manifestations of my learning through my own thinking, and learning from the knowledge created by others.
I will attempt to make this blog high-quality, educational, and dense in knowledge/learning; and importantly, everything I will share will (hopefully) be interesting/worth sharing.
2. Community I am writing here, because I beleive that sharing with the community is a great way to motivate myself, and to truly push myself to further understand. I hope that you comment on my post, share feedback, and take-part!
I’d imagine something like this to describe why sharing with the community can be beneficial:
While this is very un-nuanced, I still think it is good, and somewhat describes why knowledge should be shared!
3. Depth of knowledge The most important part of this blog is learning and deeply understanding. With every project/post, I will be asking the question: how can I dig deeper?
